audience.name: New Traffic Ad set with recommended settings

ads.name: New Traffic Ad with recommended settings
captions: Looking for the next step in your career growth? We’re seeking talented, driven individuals to join our team!

ads.name: QIU Day Awareness
captions:
🤔 Not sure which university programme is right for you? Need expert advice to help you decide? 😎

📢 Start 2025 with our FIRST QIU DAY of the year! Join us on March 22, 2025, from 10 AM to 4 PM and be among the first to explore your future with us

Meet inspiring academics, experience our dynamic learning environment, and discover the exciting opportunities that await! 🚀📚

Register on-site and enjoy a waiver on the application fee!

Bring your family, tour our campus, and take the first step toward your dream university life at QIU!

#QIUDay2025 #YourFutureStartsHere #DreamBig #OpenDay2025

ads.name: Foundation | Ad | Mandarin
captions:
迷茫？不存在的！我们来给你指路。🧭 
QIU的基础课程（Foundation）就是你的未来起点。📍
科学？商业？艺术？会计？
选择你的道路。我们将为你提供技能和知识，让你脱颖而出。

✅超给力的讲师
✅实战型学习
✅直通本科学位

🚀 2025年4月入学火热进行中！
还等什么？立即点击质询吧！🌟

ads.name: General Intake 2024 Ad
captions:
Looking to take your education to the next level? Join our April 2025 Intake and select from our range of programs, including Foundation, Diploma, Degree, and Postgraduate studies.

Choose from Foundation, Diploma, Degree, or Postgraduate programs, and kickstart your academic journey with us.

With Merit Scholarships and PTPTN financing options available, there's never been a better time to make your dreams a reality.

Apply Now—before it’s too late!

#DREAMBIG #DISCOVERQIU #QIU

ads.name: Foundation AIO 2025
captions:
🧭 Feeling like your future's a vibe you can't quite catch? QIU Foundation is your starting point.📍 

Science? Business? Arts? Accountancy?
Pick your lane
We'll give you the skills and knowledge to pop off

✅Supportive mentors & lecturers
✅Industry-focused learning
✅Direct progression to your Degree

🚀 April 2025 intake is LIVE

ads.name: MBBS Leads Ad
captions:
Experience world-class medical education at Quest International University! 

Our Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) programme will give you the skills and knowledge you need to become a successful healthcare professional
